title: Serafin Geronimo
data: Serafin Geronimo: Ang Kriminal ng Baryo Concepcion (transl.â€‰Serafin Geronimo: The Criminal of Barrio Concepcion) is a 1998 Philippine action crime film written and directed by Lav Diaz on his directorial debut. The film stars Raymond Bagatsing as the title role.[1][2][3][4][5][6]
